items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
It’s time to celebrate the reunion of the beloved UNIQLO x Marimekko limited-edition collection, enriching the humble pleasure of cozy dressing just in time for a joyful 2024 New Year. It offers head-to-toe warmth with UNIQLO’s winter signatures of soft fleeces and functional HEATTECH featuring Marimekko's world-renowned prints: Kivet (stones), Kissapöllö, and Seireeni by Maija Isola, along with Hattara by Pentti Rinta.

- A light and casual shoulder bag.
- Shaped to fit the body for active use.
- Conveniently sized to hold a smartphone or long wallet.
- Added piping helps the bag keep its shape.
- Handy inner pocket for your keys or smartphone.
- Gender neutral design.
- Clothing using recycled materials is part of our effort to support the reduction of waste and use of new materials. Ratios of recycled material vary by item. Please check “Materials” on the price tag or care label for details.
*Please note that pattern placement may differ from the photo. Your understanding is appreciated.
items.name: Round Mini Shoulder Bag
items.shortDescription: The perfect size for everyday use. Lightweight, fitted design goes where you go.
items.washingInformation: Do not wash, Do not Dry Clean, Do not tumble dry.

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
UT ARCHIVE Andy Warhol / Keith Haring / Jean-Michel Basquiat

“UT Archive” is a project that revives carefully selected T-shirts which have been sold in the past. From the UT collection that has been on sale for about 20 years, popular patterns by Andy Warhol, Basquiat, and Keith Haring will be re-released.

Andy Warhol
As the preeminent American artist of the 20th Century, Andy Warhol challenged the world to see art differently. This product is produced under a license from The Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts, Inc., a New York not-for-profit corporation which promotes the visual arts.

Keith Haring
A key figure in New York’s East Village scene in the late 1970s and 80s, American artist Keith Haring’s artwork populated not only art galleries, but also the city’s subways, streets, and sidewalks. His work often combined an iconographic vocabulary, including hearts, flying saucers, winged figures, and a crawling “radiant baby,”with abstract marks and patterning.

Jean-Michel Basquiat
An icon of New York in the 1980s, Jean-Michel Basquiat became renowned during his short career for works inspired by his early street art and a distinctive iconography often connected to art history. His paintings, drawings, and prints drew on a diverse range of sources, from African, Aztec, and Greek cultures to Americana in the form of jazz, baseball, and social and political events.

©/®/™ The Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts, Inc.
© Keith Haring Foundation. Licensed by Artestar, New York.
© Estate of Jean-Michel Basquiat. Licensed by Artestar, New York.
items.name: Jean-Michel Basquiat Archive UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)

items.longDescription:
HUNTER×HUNTER

TV anime based on the manga created by Yoshihiro Togashi, published by Shueisha Jump Comics, and sold over 84 million copies (as of 2023). The story is about a young boy named Gon, who sets out on a journey in search of his great hunter and father Ging, and his adventures with friends and rivals. A collection of T-shirts featuring designs of Nen ability and popular characters.

©P98-23 ©V・N・M

items.longDescription:
Fighting Game Legends

This collection focuses on "Street Fighter" and "TEKKEN", two games that sparked a fighting game boom in the 1990s. In recent years, both titles have attracted fans around the world as representative e-sports game titles. This graphic T-shirt collection is an exciting representation of these longtime selling games that lead the fighting game genre.

©CAPCOM
TEKKEN™&©BNEI
items.name: Fighting Game Legends UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Two legendary fighting games are now available on UT. Don't miss this dream collaboration.

items.longDescription:
Keith Haring Subway Drawings

Keith Haring created his iconic subway drawings in the 1980s in New York City, adorning blank advertising spaces with vibrant and dynamic figures. Haring's art conveys messages of unity and social activism. These impromptu masterpieces became symbols in street art and continue to inspire artists today.

Keith Haring
A key figure in New York’s East Village scene in the late 1970s and 80s, American artist Keith Haring’s artwork populated not only art galleries, but also the city’s subways, streets, and sidewalks. His work often combined an iconographic vocabulary, including hearts, flying saucers, winged figures, and a crawling “radiant baby,” with abstract marks and patterning.

© Keith Haring Foundation. Licensed by Artestar, New York.
items.name: Keith Haring Subway Drawings UT (Short-Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: This special collection focuses on the "SUBWAY DRAWINGS" that brought Keith Haring into the limelight.
items.washingInformation: Machine wash cold, Do not Dry Clean, Tumble dry low.

items.longDescription:
Sanrio characters

The Sanrio characters, especially Kuromi, who is popular for her devilish cuteness, have been gaining traction as fashion icons. This collection is sweet, spicy and easy to wear, incorporating elements of gothic and lolita fashion emblematic of Harajuku, the cultural center of Japan.

© 2023 SANRIO CO., LTD. APPROVAL NO. L643879
items.name: Sanrio Characters UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: Beloved Cinnamoroll, Kuromi, and My Melody are now available in a gothic lolita style design with a sweet and spicy vibe.
items.washingInformation: Machine wash cold, Do not Dry Clean, Tumble dry low.

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.

items.longDescription:
Hokusai Art of Water

Hokusai loved to depict various aspects of water, such as falling, rippling, and flowing water. This collection features a variety of water scenes from Hokusai's first series of landscape prints, Thirty-six Views of Mount Fuji, and his next series, the only one in which he worked on vertical landscapes.

MFA Boston
items.name: Hokusai UT (Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt)
items.shortDescription: A collection that highlights the multifaceted allure of Katsushika Hokusai's waterscapes.
items.washingInformation: Machine wash cold, Do not Dry Clean, Tumble dry low.

“UT Archive” is a project that revives carefully selected T-shirts which have been sold in the past. From the UT collection that has been on sale for about 20 years, popular patterns by Andy Warhol, Basquiat, and Keith Haring will be re-released.

Andy Warhol
As the preeminent American artist of the 20th Century, Andy Warhol challenged the world to see art differently. This product is produced under a license from The Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts, Inc., a New York not-for-profit corporation which promotes the visual arts.

Keith Haring
A key figure in New York’s East Village scene in the late 1970s and 80s, American artist Keith Haring’s artwork populated not only art galleries, but also the city’s subways, streets, and sidewalks. His work often combined an iconographic vocabulary, including hearts, flying saucers, winged figures, and a crawling “radiant baby,”with abstract marks and patterning.

Jean-Michel Basquiat
An icon of New York in the 1980s, Jean-Michel Basquiat became renowned during his short career for works inspired by his early street art and a distinctive iconography often connected to art history. His paintings, drawings, and prints drew on a diverse range of sources, from African, Aztec, and Greek cultures to Americana in the form of jazz, baseball, and social and political events.

©/®/™ The Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts, Inc.
© Keith Haring Foundation. Licensed by Artestar, New York.
© Estate of Jean-Michel Basquiat. Licensed by Artestar, New York.
Marilyn Monroe™; Rights of Publicity and Persona Rights: The Estate of Marilyn Monroe, LLC.

items.longDescription:
This piece features a design of a father and son of KAWS' popular COMPANION character. One point on the back is a design of XX, the trademark of KAWS artwork.

Uniqlo proudly presents the World’s Premier of KAWS newest artbook (Publisher: Phaidon). Launching Together: UT exclusive collection featuring original artwork designed in conjunction with KAWS art book release. Experience the cutting-edge fusion of artbook and T-shirts combined in an exciting new way.

KAWS
KAWS engages audiences far beyond the museums and galleries in which he regularly exhibits. Over the last two decades, KAWS has built a successful career with work that consistently shows his formal agility as an artist, as well as his underlying wit, irreverence, and affection for our times. He has collaborated extensively with UNIQLO, including by providing designs for the PEACE FOR ALL charity project in 2022, which was a huge worldwide success.

© KAWS

- With UV Protection technology.
- Water-repellent finish. *The fabric is coated with a water-repellent agent so the effect lasts longer. The finish is not permanent.
- Loose-fitting cut.
- Stowable hood.
- Also styles as a stand collar, so it can be worn with a variety of outfits.
items.name: UV Protection Utility Blouson
items.shortDescription: Versatile design with a stowable hood. With UV Protection technology. UPF50+.
items.washingInformation: Hand wash cold, Do not Dry Clean, Do not tumble dry.

items.composition: Face: 100% Polyamide/ Filling: 90% Down, 10% Feathers/ Back: 100% Polyamide/ Pocket Lining: 100% Polyester
items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
- Made with ultra fine yarns for incredible lightness.
- Warm premium down with a fill power of 750*. *Measured by the IDFB method
- Specially constructed without down packing for an ultra light weight.
- Anti-static lining.
- Water-repellent finish. *The fabric is coated with a water-repellent agent so the effect lasts longer. The finish is not permanent.
- Boxy cut in a slightly shorter length.
- Covered fastener helps keep cold air out.
- Pocketable design.
items.name: Ultra Light Down Jacket
items.shortDescription: Premium down plus technology equals warmth and incredible lightness. In a short length for a balanced style. Extra sizes available!
items.washingInformation: Hand wash cold, Do not dry clean

items.composition: Shell: 42% Polyamide, 37% Wool, 21% Polyester/ Sleeve Lining: 100% Polyester ( 40% Uses Recycled Polyester Fiber )/ Pocket Lining: Outer Layer: 100% Polyester ( 40% Uses Recycled Polyester Fiber )/ Pocket Lining: Inner Layer: 42% Polyamide, 37% Wool, 21% Polyester
items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
- High-quality wool provides a smooth feel.
- Gusseted pockets sewn to the body create clean lines.
- Classic design with tailored collar.
items.name: Double Face Long Coat
items.shortDescription: The distinctive smooth texture of high-quality wool. Classic tailored collar design.
items.washingInformation: Do not wash, Dry Clean, Do not tumble dry.

items.freeInformation: - The images shown may include colors that are not available.
items.longDescription:
- Made from 100% cashmere, the gem of fibers.
- Lightweight, warm, and smooth feel.
- This sweater is created using the WHOLEGARMENT®* method, which knits an entire garment at once for a comfortable fit that conforms to the body. *WHOLEGARMENTⓇ is a registered trademark of Shima Seiki Mfg., Ltd.
- The yarn thickness is matched to the WHOLEGARMENTⓇ machine to make a durable fabric.
- A special finish makes hand washing possible. *Since the shape of the garment may change when hung on a hanger, we recommend drying it flat after washing and folding it when storing.
- Updated underarms for improved stretch and ease of movement.
- Loose-fitting comfort with a streamlined look.
- The cuffs, hem, and neckline are made with a special threading technique to prevent stretching and create a durable construction.
items.name: 3D Knit Cashmere Long Sleeve Crew Neck Sweater
items.shortDescription: This next-generation sweater combines technology and the finest fabrics. Softness and warmth that conforms to your body.
items.washingInformation: Hand wash cold, Dry Clean, Do not tumble dry.
